id.description: The unique identifier of the rtc-room component
id.description_zh: rtc-room 组件的唯一标识符

enableCamera.description: Whether to turn on the camera

enableAutoFocus.description: Whether to turn on camera autofocus
enableAutoFocus.description_zh: 是否开启摄像头自动对焦

enableZoom.description: Whether to adjust the camera focus by swiping with both hands
enableZoom.description_zh: 是否支持双手滑动调整摄像头聚焦

devicePosition.description: Set the front or rear camera, valid values: front, back
devicePosition.description_zh: 设置前置还是后置摄像头，有效值：front、back

enableMic.description: Whether to turn on the microphone

enableAgc.description: Whether to turn on audio auto-gain
enableAgc.description_zh: 是否开启音频自动增益

enableAns.description: Whether to turn on audio noise suppression
enableAns.description_zh: 是否开启音频噪声抑制

enableRemoteMirror.description: Set the mirroring effect of the image seen by the remote end, and the change of this property will not affect the local picture, but only the image effect seen by the remote end
enableRemoteMirror.description_zh: 设置远端看到的画面的镜像效果，该属性的变化不会影响到本地画面，仅影响远端看到的画面效果

localMirror.description: Set the mirroring effect of the local camera preview image, valid values: auto, enable, disable
localMirror.description_zh: 设置本地摄像头预览画面的镜像效果，有效值：auto、enable、disable

soundMode.description: Set the sound output mode, valid values: speaker, ear
soundMode.description_zh: 设置声音输出方式，有效值：speaker、ear

onStateChange.description: 房间状态变化事件，参考下方状态码，detail = { code, msg, userInfo }
onStateChange.description_zh: 房间状态变化事件，参考下方状态码，detail = { code, msg, userInfo }

onError.description: 错误事件。 参考下方错误码,detail = { errMsg, errCode }
onError.description_zh: 错误事件。参考下方错误码，detail = { errMsg, errCode }
